message:
Suspicious Activity Report!

Observed by C on February 22, 2011 at 1:15 p.m.:

"Today at exactly 1:15 PM, two low-flying, CH-47 Chinook Helicopters traveling from East to West, flew directly over my head. This was between Flamingo Road and Tropicana Blvd. I was on Maryland Parkway, across from the University of Nevada. The Helicopters flew directly toward the Strip. This is an area where I have lived and frequented for years and very rarely ever saw military helicopters flying this low toward Las Vegas Blvd. Oddly most people went about their business without ever looking up. There has been no mention of this in the local media."

http://www.meetup.com/socalmartiallawalerts/messages/boards/thread/10483557
